backend/main.mo: Motoko backend handling access control, user profiles, and submission storage for consultancy, partner registration, and AMC enquiries with ID generation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report detailing build‑fix tasks for empty TSX components and a troubleshooting note update.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of various frontend components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites and steps for verifying and deploying the app to the IC mainnet.
frontend/GOOGLE_SHEETS_EXPORT.md: Guide for configuring optional Google Sheets export via Apps Script for form submissions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind‑based global style definitions including extensive OKLCH color tokens and dark‑mode variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, root mount point, and runtime Google Sheets config placeholders.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining layout, router configuration, and route components for all pages including admin submissions.
frontend/src/components/CareerSection.ts: Placeholder React component exporting a minimal CareerSection element.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Placeholder React component exporting a minimal ContactSection element.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a footer with branding, navigation buttons, and social media links using react-icons and TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides a responsive header with navigation menus, dropdowns, and mobile menu handling using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Placeholder Hero component rendering an empty container.
frontend/src/components/Products.tsx: Placeholder Products component rendering an empty container.
frontend/src/components/ScrollToTop.tsx: Scrolls the page to the top on mount and on route changes by subscribing to TanStack Router events.
frontend/src/components/SolarCalculatorA: Displays solar calculation assumptions in a styled card using values from a SolarAssumptions object.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFab.tsx: Floating WhatsApp button linking to a preset chat message using a generated wa.me URL.
frontend/src/config/googleSheetsConfig.t: Retrieves Google Sheets API configuration from window config or environment variables and provides helper checks for enabled exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdmin.ts: Queries the backend to determine if the current authenticated user is an admin, syncing with actor and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication, identities, and login state via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for submitting forms and fetching admin-protected data using an actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with custom CSS variables, dark mode theming, and animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/formatCurrency.ts: Provides INR currency and number formatting utilities, including compact formats for lakhs and crores.
frontend/src/lib/formatTimestamp.ts: Converts nanosecond timestamps into human-readable localized date strings.
frontend/src/lib/googleSheetsExport.ts: Utilities to export various form submissions to Google Sheets via configured HTTP endpoints.
frontend/src/lib/solarCalculator.ts: Implements solar system sizing, cost estimation, environmental impact calculations, and input validation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, identity provider, and global styles.
Admin dashboard page handling authentication, role checks, and displaying all form submissions.
frontend/src/pages/AmcPage.tsx: Form page for submitting AMC enquiries, handling validation, backend submission, optional Google Sheets export, and UI layout.
frontend/src/pages/CareersPage.tsx: Static careers page showing upcoming job openings, company values, and future roles.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialSolarPage.t: Landing page describing commercial solar solutions, benefits, and a call-to-action for consultancy.
frontend/src/pages/ExpertConsultancyPage: Form page for requesting expert solar consultancy with backend submission, Google Sheets export, retries, and validation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring a solar savings calculator, input validation, results display, and marketing sections.
frontend/src/pages/HybridSystemPage.tsx: Promotional page explaining hybrid solar systems, benefits, workflow steps, and a link to consultancy.
frontend/src/pages/IndustrialSolarPage.t: Page presenting industrial solar solutions with hero section, feature cards, and navigation to consultancy.
frontend/src/pages/OffGridSystemPage.tsx: Page describing off‑grid solar systems with workflow steps, imagery, and a button linking to consultancy.
frontend/src/pages/OnGridSystemPage.tsx: Page explaining on‑grid solar systems, including process steps, benefits, and navigation to consultancy.
Page showcasing residential solar solutions with animated hero, benefits cards, and a consultancy CTA.
frontend/src/pages/SolarAttaChakkiPage.t: Page detailing solar-powered atta chakki products with benefits, imagery, and a quote request button.
frontend/src/pages/SolarWaterPumpPage.ts: React page displaying marketing content for a solar water pump with images, feature cards, and a navigation button to the consultancy page.
frontend/src/pages/TrustedPartnerPage.ts: React page providing a partner registration form with validation, backend submission, optional Google Sheets export, and retry handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both standard and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, shadows, keyframes, and container settings for the project’s UI theme.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, known issues, feature requirements, and admin authentication plans.
